name: The Flying Sun Adventure Game
description:
Once upon a time, the Sun fell from the sky – there came a time of havoc and darkness all around the world.

Now you are on a mission to rescue civilization and stop this crazy catastrophe! Set the speed and direction, get the Sun ball ready and start the race! Just jump and run to get out of the scary forest — fly through thorny trees and bushes while getting all the achievements!

Collect as many coins as you can for upgrades and power-ups — they will help you refine your level and finish this expedition!

Just accept this challenge and get all the prizes — prove there are no impossible missions for heroes!

Game Features:
- FREE application
- Loads of Achievements
- Powerful speed boosters
- Fun and easy
- Kids-friendly
- Nice graphics

Challenge your skills and don't miss out on having fun with The Flying Sun Adventure Game while it's free!
